title: Buy Chola Finance, target price Rs 720: Chandan Taparia - Economic Times
content: Buy Chola Finance, target price Rs 720: Chandan Taparia  Economic Times
description: Cholamandalam Investment & Finance Company Ltd., incorporated in the year 1978, is a Large Cap company (having a market cap of Rs 53186.63 Crore) operating in NBFC sector.
